itemInfo.itemDesc: HP Auto Recovery +15 for 8 min.\n- Cooldown : 10 min.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: HP Potion (Small)
item.desc:
Immediately heals HP by+75
- Cooldown : 5 sec.
- It can be purchased at a Shop
Recovery +45% if affected by a debuff that restricts actions.

item.name: Sunrise Herb
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Cron Castle Site and Balenos Forest. It can also be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.
